ygData.subject: Bardic get together
ygData.msgSnippet: Count me in on the running with Zixors event, date & time permitting.  But perhaps we should use Lemming in our names instead? Another thought, if we can t
ygData.messageBody:
Count me in on the "running with Zixors" event, date & time permitting. But
perhaps we should use "Lemming" in our names instead?

Another thought, if we can't make it all the way to Lavastorm, is to play
around on the chessboard. We could all run around complaining about how
tough the life of a pawn is until some high level baddy comes along and
swats us.

Or, if we all name ourselves Dolphin1, Dolphin2, etc, we could chase the
boats leaving for Antonica.

Is it possible to have diffent characters from the same account in different
guilds? If so, if someone could start up a guild on whichever server we
have the event on, and call this guild "Lollypop", we all join it, and as
representatives of the Lollypop guild we go on a quest to rescue Dorothy.

I think I'd better stop now...

Peace
Evulia of Tunare
Kingbird of Brell
